class EPF[source]

EPF()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Load specific group

{% raw %} 
pjm = EPF.load('data', group='PJM')
pjm_test = EPF.load('data', group='PJM', training=False)

Load set of groups

{% raw %} 
groups = ['PJM', 'NP', 'FR', 'BE', 'DE']
pjm = EPF.load_groups('data', groups=groups)
pjm_test = EPF.load_groups('data', groups=groups)
